name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an intruder exploited a vulnerable web application and executed a series of scripted commands to manipulate database entries and exfiltrate sensitive data.

action--c4791d1e-c8f4-493c-bd82-44de87d7.name: Kill malicious process
action--c4791d1e-c8f4-493c-bd82-44de87d7.description: Terminate any processes executing the suspicious script.

action--bbd71252-2eeb-4f7e-b8e8-ff2e78f5.name: Disable network access for the compromised host
action--bbd71252-2eeb-4f7e-b8e8-ff2e78f5.description: Block any incoming network connections from the compromised host.

loop--71c71b80-fb4f-4b3f-83be-281bde0556.name: Run security scan on affected host
loop--71c71b80-fb4f-4b3f-83be-281bde0556.description: Perform a security scan on the compromised host until the scan result is clean.

action--71c71b80-fb4f-4b3f-83be-281bde05.name: Security scan command
action--71c71b80-fb4f-4b3f-83be-281bde05.description: Execute the security scan on the compromised host.
